/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the vibrant city life. The street is lined with a variety of shops and restaurants, their facades adorned with colorful signs and awnings that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy traffic typical of city life. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the bustling activity below.
